Question: The film earned this person a fee of $400,000 (US$2.64 million in 2013 dollars) and 25 percent of its net box-office takings.
Hints: This person has possessed a passion for music all his life.
This person befriended Locke's husband and purchased a house in Crescent Heights for Anderson and his male lover.
This person, then 28, felt his character Rowdy was too young and cloddish for him to feel comfortable with the part.
